headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' *.vercel.app *.up.railway.app; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' *.vercel.app; font-src 'self' data: *.vercel.app; img-src 'self' data: *.vercel.app *.up.railway.app upload.wikimedia.org developer.apple.com; connect-src 'self' *.vercel.app *.up.railway.app;
